author: Lee Weaver
comment: To win this game you have to hit the blue circle into the red circle which then has to hit another red, in which case it turns into a purple then if you score through the goals followed by it striking another purple it then turns into a frozen turkey which when loaded into the frozen turkey cannon then can be shot into adolf hitlers anus. Then you win. Horrah!!

reply.author: Jappetto Games
reply.content: Thank you for the review. To clear things up, you can only control the blue ball with your touch. A pull force is applied to the blue ball towards where you touch on screen. Further your touch from blue, greater the pull. Other tasks are done by controlling blue. Blue2Yellow, Red2Red, Purple2Hole and hit the star fast.

title: Ok!?....i think?
